general_info: For everything your organization is, it is also a collection of processes in which experts and staff define, create, transform and deliver value to internal and external clients. The capability of your people, your value creators, depends upon the efficiency, ease of use and effectiveness of the tools you provide them. Furthermore, the ability of your organization to always know how well your processes are working, how efficiently and effectively work is being delivered can make all the difference in keeping things moving forward. A business process application, or a full fledged business process technology layer, can help: Ultimately, business process application development means more, higher quality work at an increasingly reduced cost. Please talk to us about how we can make this happen for you. We have been developing business process applications since 2000. Our experience has shown us how to efficiently incorporate the organization learning experience of business process application development within the context of timely delivery and budgetary realities, but in consideration that improvements and efficiencies to current business processes will also be a likely outcome. The following list of stages can be delivered as a complete process or individually, so that organizational resources are most effectively applied or improved.

general_info: Take your marketing manager and turn them into a designer. Turn them  into a magnificent designer with conceptually striking ideas and  brilliantly meticulous execution. Then have this new wonder person  design everything -- your business cards, your website, even your fun  new little cartoon man to demo your products. And now... your projects  are grabbing and stimulating. Your customers are so captivated and  excited that they want to give you more money.   Bliss.   Ridiculously  intense involuntary bliss.   That's what you get with Hatton Designs  -- artistically innovative design with a direct integration of your  unique marketing strategies. Our discovery process and daily progress  reports will let you easily relay your idiosyncrasies and monitor their  conveyance. Take advantage of 20 years of combined sales experience to  create or enhance your brand, execute your projects, and boost your  sales in a new, fresh, and effective way that no one other than Hatton  Designs can provide. Based out of Washington, DC,  Hatton-Designs was created by a husband and wife team  with over 20 years of combined sales and marketing experience delving  into the design business. We specialize in static sites, flash sites  with innovative animation techniques, e-commerce sites with easy to use  backend programming, branding and marketing material design.   Use Hatton Designs to create a functional, attractive, and motivating  design that falls right in line with your marketing strategy. You will  have an exact visual communication of your company or organization’s  best attributes and selling points. Your website visitors will love what  you have to provide.

general_info:
Done. Collective exceeds expectations! 
      We are a boutique web design and print design company operating in Washington DC, Virginia and Maryland      With over eight years experience, we offer web design and print design   services to the Greater Washington DC Area, Virginia, Maryland, the   continental United States, as well as countries throughout Europe.      Done Collective is an innovative web design and print design company   that creates crisp and to-the-point brand identities. Our designs and   web-applications combine creative and interactive usability to engage   audiences and build meaningful relationships with them.      We Listen      Our ears are always open. It is our number one priority to listen to   clients' wants, needs and objectives. We will constantly ask for input   and feedback while we guide clients through every step of the creative   process.      We don't believe in the "short-term"      Upon completion of a project, we don't sit back and wait. We constantly   update, innovate and take action to ensure long-term success, both   online and off. We listen, create, and think ahead for longevity among   clients and their audience. Our team confronts challenges head on, and,   collectively, we get things done.
